เป็นเกมที่ดีนะ ต้องพึ่งโชคอย่างนึงเลย  กับเรื่องฆาตกร แรงค์สูงๆ ก็ใช่ว่า จะไม่เจอ ฆาตกรแย่ๆ แคมป์ก็ดี โซนเก่งก็มี และต้องพึ่งทีมเช่นกัน แต่บางคนจู๊คเก่ง ก็ไหว สามารถ เอาตัวรอดได้อย่างง่าย เลย แต่จัดได้ว่าเกมนี้เป็นเกมที่ดีมากๆ พัฒนามาได้ไกลมากๆ ตอนแรกๆ คิดว่าเกมนี้จะตายไปแล้ว แต่สุดท้าย ก็ยังไม่ตาย ยังคงมีฆาตกรและเซอร์ใหม่ๆออกมา แต่ยังคงความเป็น Dev เสมอคือ perk ฆาตกร จะโกงกว่า ser เสมอ แต่ser ก็จะมี perk โหดๆเลย perk นึง 

ตายละ เล่นมาจะ 800 ชม. เพิ่งมารีวิวแบบจริงๆจังๆ

Wiec z grą Dead by Daylight spotkałem się od premiery w czerwcu oglądając Youtuberów.Twórca zaciekawił mnie prostotą gry,ale kupując ją kilka dni od premierą solidnie przemyślałem nad kupnem jej.Gra jest Horrorem+Zręcznościówką po obejrzeniu Tutoriala* zrozumieć się da ,że celem jest ucieknięcie z mapy przez bramy .Przy okazji ulepszając nasze postacie zdobywamy *Umiejętności* które pomagają nam w rozgrywce jak i przedmioty.Zaciekawiony zdobywając kolejne umiejętności które staje się z czasem monotonne.Grając z ludźmi z świata można współpracować,lecz jest bardzo ciężkie,Opisując rozgrywke która jest ciekawa *Tylko z znajomymi*
 W grze można na trafić na różne błędy które są bardzo denerwujące.Gra zachowuje dobry klimat wczuwając sie w przetrwańca, jest odczuwalny stres który towarzyszy nam przez całą rozgrywke.
Zmieniłem opinie ,przez DLC Bill'a z Left 4 Dead który podratował Dead by Daylight 
Gre oceniam na 7/10 pomimu małej liczbie błędów .

一开始知道这个游戏是在直播平台上面，一个恐怖游戏硬是被主播玩成了一个换了游戏，非常欢乐。
于是自己也买了这游戏（也是入坑steam的第一款游戏）。
你问我这游戏怎么样？赞！非常赞！成人版的躲猫猫，那随着屠夫一步步靠近而逐渐变大的心跳声，真的让人感到非常刺激！

Bonjour,

Jouant en solo, je n'ai pas trop de souçis pour trouver des parties ( avec les tueurs ... les survivants, c'est une autre histoire ... ).

Mise à part cet inconvenient qui sera sûrement amélioré, je trouve l'équilibrage plutôt pas mal compte tenue du fait qu'il n'y a pas que la " puissance et les pouvoirs " des personnages mais aussi la facon de jouer plus ou moins bonne des joueurs ...

Graphiquement, le jeu est jolie sans exploser la rétine. 
Mais c'est surtout l'ambiance qu'il dégage de part une DA sombre mais surtout une bande son avec des effects aux petits oignons :)

Je débute mais je prend autant de plaisir à jouer survivant que tueur, les deux ayant un gameplay différents renouvelant l'expérience.

Maintenant, j'attend de nouvelles Maps avec peut-être une inspiration un peu différente que " les bois, les bois heueueu les bois, aussi les bois, ah si le maîs et les ruines ".
Bref un peu plus d'originalité.

Je conseille ce jeu du chat et des souries, bien trash et fun, malgré ses problèmes de jeunesse ( qui à priori durent depuis un peu trop longtemps ke même ^^).

Bonne pioche IMO.

.

If you are a free to play player the game isn't normally this imbalanced. Hopefully they fix it soon and you can experiance it as what it should be.

Dead by Daylight ist mein Lieblings-Koop-Spiel. Es bietet eine wahnsinns Spiel-Atmosphere. Sowohl die Belichtungs- als auch die Soundeffekte (die mich ein wenig an Silent Hill erinnern) sind außergewöhnlich gut. Zusätzlich bringt es einen interessantes Skill / Level / Rank / Reward System mit. Der Hersteller ist bemüht eine angemessene Spiel-Balance sicherzustellen und Bugs schnellstens zu beseitigen. Teile der Maps werden bei jeder Runde zufällig generiert und da man sowieso niemals wissen kann welchem Killer man sich gegenüber sieht, besitzt das Spiel einen sehr hohen Wiederspielwert und bereitet auch nach einigen Stunden sehr viel Freude. 

Solltet ihr Survival-Horror und Coop-Spiele lieben, kann ich dieses Spiel nur wärmstens empfehlen

:)

I will start by saying that this game, without a doubt, has a very high learning curve for both surviors and killers. If you can fight through that, this game is a must play online horror game. The game developers have consistently listened to the community and have been constantly patching the game since release. They have also released 2-3 very top notch DLC packs that have genuinely increased the value of the game and did not alienate/fragment any of the userbase. If you like horror and online games, definitely try this one out.

Dead By Daylight in five words:
1. Fun
2. Terrifying
3. Annoying
4. lol
5. Pikachu

This game is great, tons of fun, always something to work towards.
The game has LOTs of potential.
but it's far from living up to it at this moment.
i will change my opinion if they change things.

The major issue, is matchmaking.
I played even before the free to play weekend
and spent almost 3 hours getting rolled by killers...
they had 3-4 red perks, lvl 40~50 and sometimes crazy high rank
while i was lvl 1, rank 20 with zero decent perks or items.

Not only that, but if you get downed and hooked you are DONE.
Because when you start out, you have people who won't save you.
Either due to also being new and unknowledgeable or afraid to,
or just selfish players using you as a distraction.
i had 3 games where I popped every generator by MYSELF.
and 2 games where i got 3 or 4, BUT and then got caught out.

OR... you get killers who hook you and then sit there,
watching as you die, waiting for AGES as you bleed out.
Making it impossible for you to be rescued.
Which, if you don't know the game, actually is BAD to do as killer.
Because you get no points, no exp, no score.
and you deny the survivor you hooked score/exp.
you just gimped both of your scores. for nothing.
and new killers do NOT understand this.
so you get perma campers every game.
and it sucks. very anti-fun.

the game doesn't really explain that ensuring a kill
denies you points from doing other objectives.

This is a major issue, as the things you unlock via bloodweb
are huge factors against others with good perks and items.
ESPECIALLY if you are new.
Once you understand the game, items and perks matter less.
but getting low points/exp at the start
really slows your progress to a crawl.

The game is EXTREMELY unfriendly to new players though.
The only way to play is against others, with no clear explaination
of most of the mechanics of the game when you first start out.
You have to stumble around in the dark, LITERALLY.

Most of the advantage comes from knowing the maps
and since it throws you straight into ranked...
there is no way to really mess around to learn them.

I will say this though.
I like the game concept and gameplay.
But the amount of work and time that I have to play
to catch up to the majority of the playerbase...
all the while being at a disadvantage...
while being matched against much higher ranks...

tl;dr
Watch others play the game, on twitch or youtube
learn the game through other's eyes first
because you don't have the luxury of learning thru your own.

also, nurse is broken as hell
teleporter with auto-aim attacks...
好多外挂啊，严重影响了游戏体验，求严查，谢谢
Would be a great game if the matchmaking wasn't ass.

Amazing game, but can have a few improvements. New killer get even more OP as they are released but new survivors are bad..very bad as compared to the killers. So they should release some good survivors too instead of just new killers

EDIT
The only problem with this game is that sometimes the match-making just dies. Nowadays (19/10/17) everyone just becomes a survivor and takes forever to find a killer. And if you become a killer, takes 1 min to find them. I have only been playing as survivor, and i will stick with them no matter what. But the only problem with this game is the match-making.
And yes the killers and survivors are more balanced now than they were few months before

在周免玩了几个小时后，我决定资磁一下这款游戏

虽然第一次玩的时候老是加入游戏失败（后面突然又正常了）
虽然偶尔玩着玩着这游戏就崩溃，有时候游戏里的判定也让人费解
虽然它还有各种各样的问题

但是它成功的把我拉进了那个世界
无论是心跳声越来越大，自己躲在掩体后的那种恐惧
还是那种最后只剩自己一个人时到处寻找地道的绝望
还是那种修发电机，开门时的提心吊胆
还是成功脱逃之后的喜悦，之类的等等
都十分真实
每次游戏都给我一种在看一场恐怖片一样的感觉，甚至更甚
对我来说，这游戏的确做到了它想要我感受到的
就冲这像是看了场恐怖片一样的感觉（还自带中文字幕）这些钱就当是电影票钱了吧

希望制作者能越来越完善这个游戏，让它变得更好！

（开黑吗带我一个，我爆米花贼J8溜！）

（话说有一盘人类就剩我一个了，那鬼找到我后没挂我反而放我下来，跟着，看着我修完了五个发电机......还开了门......然后门前把我干掉了(-__-)b虽然是意料之中，不过还真是一次奇妙的体验......）

개인적으로는 게임에 대한 생각은 좋다고 봅니다.랭크 올리는게 탈출로 따지는게 아닌 일정 점수로 랭크를 올리다보니
기어도가 많지만 아쉽게 잡힌 사람들도 랭크를 올릴수 있다는 점에는 마음이 듭니다.
게임을 해보면서 살인마가 버프가 많고 생존자가 너프가 많다고 말들이많은데  게임특성상 살인마가 어느정도의 위압감이있어야 게임이 재밋다고 생각합니다.생존자가 버프가 되면 살인마 입장에서는 지금도 까다롭게 느껴져 살인마를 잘 안하는 상태인데살인마 입장에서 귀를 귀울이는것도 당연하다 생각합니다. 게임에도 강조되는 거지만 위 게임은 개인이 아닌 팀플게임으로써의 부분이 많은만큼그 부분을 강조시키기 위해 어쩔수 없는 살인마 버프가 있다 봅니다. 새로나온 살인마의 능력으로만 보면 사기일지 모르지만그만큼 개인이 아닌 팀으로써의 역활을 더 많이 부각시킨거 같습니다.
추후 업데이트 내용은 개선의 필요성은 있겠지만지금 상태도 나쁘지 않다고 봅니다.
遇到开外挂的根本没有投诉的入口，我已经遇到无数裂空玩家，砍了他一刀还是没他跑的快，同感的举手！赶紧出个制裁外挂的机制吧
硬件,服務器優化還待提高.可玩性,刺激性滿分.但是外掛氾濫,總是有時掉線,以及後期遊戲的可玩性給此作降了不少分.

作为一个被屠夫带到地下室刷了15分钟分数的人类来说，实在是一种糟糕的游戏体验，他不把你挂到钩子上，而是不停把你扛起放下，然后你就会进入受伤状态，他就会把你砍倒，接着重复上述步骤，最后你只能无奈强退，之前努力得到的分数也全部作废。
希望能出台一些规则防治这种情况的发生，这样我想游戏体验会好的多

An awesome game with one of the best dev teams I have ever seen. Has a lot of replay value because the ranks reset and they keep adding awesome new things to the game. If any of the devs read this keep doing whatchu doin Love ya <3

I recently played this while it was free on steam and here are some thoughts and issues. When you first begin to play as a survivor you can expect to get reckted the first few rounds. There is really nothing letting you know what to do. The killer will seem horribly overpowered at first. I found that they are not as overpowered as it seems. While they don't have to hit you many times and it seems that they are right on your tail, if you can run randomly and get over obstacles than you have a chance to escape. This game does have some scares. I was playing with a friend and we were fixing the generator than all of a sudden the killer that turns invisible was right next to both of us. Scared the living shit out of us. It was very fun and winning is very doable once you get the hang of it and play with people that are not level 1. The game does have some issues though.
--playing with a friend can be a bad experience. Multiplayer is fine very badly. My friend and I would have to back out of every gane and reinvite to continue the party. This is something that with most AAA titles would be seen as unacceptable. 
--Also, the game will let you click ready when you are already searching for a game which leads to a bug that stops the game search and will not allow anyone in the party to do anything. This leads to having to relog the client to continue play. 
--Items you get are notated as having uses. In actuality it is more like having a certain amount of usable seconds instead of uses. This could be explained more or reworded maybe. 
--certain aspects of the game seem unexplained. Does startling crows alert that spot to the killer? 
--It is entirely way to difficult to wiggle your way out of the attackers arms. With one execption. Of the survivors have diasbked hooks and the killer can only use the basement than it is easy to escape because the killer may have to walk for like 2 mins just to get to the basement. 

I would almost consider buying this if,some things were fixed. It seems great. I enjoyed the few hours I got to play it. The blood web system was awesome but can be worked on. The overall concept is great. The experience can be generally scary. Everyone who has watched a scary movie and thought man I would hide in the closet what is that stupid idiot doing hiding under the table, you kind of have the opportunity to do that somewhat here. It is scary and shit to run away from the killer and not even be able to see them. Really enjoyed the experience. I hope it has more free play time soon.

This is a good game, but the community is heavily plagued by toxic players who must have been abused as children to act as horrible as they do. Be ready to deal with people like that, but don't assume everyone is that way. In conclusion, game = good, people = bad(a lot of the time)

I want a singleplayer mode so that I don't have to deal with other people.

This game used to be fun, but the devs decided that lining their pockets was the better option. Besides, who would want to make sure their game is working when they can just pump out dlc to make more money? 10/10 best business ethics ever, hopefully Friday the 13th the game will be better.

Updating my review to reccomended now.

Since my last review, the developers have fixed many bugs with the game that I had issues with. These include the pallet teleporting and rediculous lunge range (though it still is fairly annoying, but nowhere near as bad).

Progression also got a lot quicker, and you now get a choice at higher levels of what perk you want to take in a bloodweb (there is still a chance you wont get it).

This is a great game with friends, though a lot of players are very angry people. Expect a lot of salt from both sides as you play. Just ignore it and continue to have fun.

Things I'm hoping the developers will look into and implement in the future:
1. Lobby Ping - see the host's ping before the match begins.
2. Something to fix when a killer pulls his plug for a second, causing survivors to DC intentionally and lose pips. This has been increasingly annoying lately.
3. A reward for being Rank 1.
4. Slightly more bloodpoint gain for survivors, as it's kind of low in comparison to killer.
5. More maps for each location to balance out seeing Coldwind Farm a majority of the time.

Keep in mind, this game is not easy to start out with. There is a lot of learning to do, expect to die often as a survivor, or get very few points/kills as the killer. There is a massive skill difference between a rank 20 and a rank 1, even without perks to supplement playstyles.
